survey_name: Employee Experience with AI-Powered HR Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on employee experiences and satisfaction levels with AI-powered HR tools used within the organization.

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered HR tools do you currently use in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Consider using a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which AI-powered HR tools do you currently use in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered HR tools you use?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option except 'None of the above' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.
